# GitHub Repository Topics

This file contains recommended topics for the Sentio IoT GitHub repository to improve discoverability.

## How to Add Topics

1. Go to: https://github.com/NickScherbakov/sentio-iot
2. Click "About" ⚙️ (gear icon) on the right sidebar
3. Add the topics listed below
4. Click "Save changes"

## Topic Limits

GitHub allows up to **20 topics** per repository. Choose the most relevant ones based on:

1. Your target audience
2. Primary use cases
3. Key differentiators
4. Search optimization

## Recommended Set (Top 20)

If you can only use 20 topics, we recommend:

1. `iot`

These topics help with GitHub search and Google discovery:

## Updating Topics

Topics should be reviewed and updated:
- When adding major features
- When targeting new use cases
- Based on community feedback
- Every 6 months
